.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_future:

:orphan:

Future examples
===============

Examples that use ``__future__``.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Test that __future__ imports inside sphinx_gallery modules does not affect the parsing of this ...">

.. only:: html

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_future_plot_future_imports_broken.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>

   :hidden:

   /auto_examples/future/plot_future_imports_broken

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_future_plot_future_imports.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>
